key.name: gsettings-migrated
key.description: This key shows whether or not GConf values were migrated to GSettings

key.name: backup-url
key.description: URL where the backup is saved to.

key.name: show-logout
key.description: If TRUE, Sugar will show a "Log out" option.

key.name: show-restart
key.description: If TRUE, Sugar will show a "Restart" option.

key.name: show-shutdown
key.description: If TRUE, Sugar will show a "Shutdown" option.

key.name: show-register
key.description: If TRUE, Sugar will show a "Register" option in the buddy palette.

key.name: protected-activities
key.description: Users will not be allowed to erase these activities through the list view.

key.name: maximum-number-of-open-activities
key.summary: A limit to the number of simultaneously open activities.
key.description: This int is used to set a limit to the number of open activities. By default (0), there is no limit.

key.name: nick
key.description: User name that is used throughout the desktop.

key.name: default-nick
key.description: "disabled" to ask nick on initialization; "system" to reuse UNIX account long name.

key.name: color
key.description: Color for the XO icon that is used throughout the desktop. The string is composed of the stroke color and fill color, format is that of rgb colors. Example: #AC32FF,#9A5200

key.name: gender
key.description: Gender of the Sugar user, either male, female, or unassigned

key.name: birth-timestamp
key.description: Birth timestamp (seconds since the epoch)

key.name: group-label
key.description: Label associated with age, e.g., '2nd Grade'

key.name: image-path
key.description: Path to the image to be used as a background.

key.name: alpha-level
key.description: The opacity of the background image.

key.name: mime-registry
key.description: Consists of key-value pairs mimetypes and their corresponding activity

key.name: volume
key.description: Volume level for the sound device.

key.name: mute
key.description: Setting for muting the sound device.

key.name: brightness
key.description: Brightness level for the computer screen.

key.name: timezone
key.description: Timezone setting for the system.

key.name: homeviews
key.description: List of home views, including the view icon, the favorite icon and the layout

key.name: edge-delay
key.description: Delay for the activation of the frame using the edges.

key.name: corner-delay
key.description: Delay for the activation of the frame using the corners.

key.name: jabber-server
key.description: URL of the jabber server to use.

key.name: publish-gadget
key.description: If TRUE, Sugar will make us searchable for the other users of the Jabber server.

key.name: social-help-server
key.description: URL of the social help server to use with protocol.

key.name: automatic
key.description: Automatic power management (increases battery life)

key.name: extreme
key.description: Extreme power management (disables wireless radio, increases battery life)

key.name: layouts
key.description: List of keyboard layouts. Each entry should be in the form layout(variant)

key.name: options
key.description: List of keyboard options.

key.name: model
key.description: The keyboard model to be used

key.name: default-face
key.description: Font face that is used throughout the desktop.

key.name: default-size
key.description: Font size that is used throughout the desktop.

key.name: adhoc
key.description: If TRUE, Sugar will show default Ad-hoc networks for channel 1,6 and 11. If Sugar sees no "known" network when it starts, it does autoconnect to an Ad-hoc network.

key.name: adhoc-autoconnect
key.description: If TRUE, Sugar will autoconnect to Ad-hoc networks.

key.name: username
key.description: GSM network username configuration (DEPRECATED/UNUSED)

key.name: password
key.description: GSM network password configuration (DEPRECATED/UNUSED)

key.name: number
key.description: GSM network telephone number configuration (DEPRECATED/UNUSED)

key.name: apn
key.description: GSM network access point name configuration (DEPRECATED/UNUSED)

key.name: pin
key.description: GSM network personal identification number configuration (DEPRECATED/UNUSED)

key.name: puk
key.description: GSM network personal unlock key configuration (DEPRECATED/UNUSED)

key.name: country
key.description: TODO: add description

key.name: provider
key.description: TODO: add description

key.name: plan
key.description: TODO: add description

key.name: pitch
key.summary: Pitch value for the speech sugar service
key.description: Pitch value used by the speech service in Sugar

key.name: rate
key.summary: Rate value for the speech sugar service
key.description: Rate value used by the speech service in Sugar

key.name: backend
key.description: Activity update backend module, followed by a period, followed by the class name.

key.name: microformat-update-url
key.description: URL used by the microformat update backend for activity update information.

key.name: auto-update-frequency
key.description: Frequency of automatic activity updates, measured in days. 0 means disabled.

key.name: last-activity-update
key.description: A unix timestamp (seconds since epoch) of the last successful activity update.

key.name: new-aslo-url
key.description: URL used by the new ASLO updater to download activity data.

key.name: hardware-model
key.summary: A description of the hardware available to the user.
key.description: This string is displayed in the control panel, about computer section.
